title: League loading screen
body: Every time after team select my league doesnt load and it turns gray.

replies.body: You might be having a network issue that's failing to transition from champion select to the game server, so you'll end up in a dormant state or eventually crash out.  I suggest going over each step in this [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
